com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware

Class DcMotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor

  • public class DcMotor
extends java.lang.Object
    Control a DC Motor attached to a DC Motor Controller
    See Also:
